title: ID needed for two type faces. Serif and Script
content:
Any help is appreciated.

I am looking to identify the ampersand used in the “Funeral Home “&” Cremation Service”  
And the serif font used for “Funeral Home”

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062733im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/westford_6022.jpg)

Thanks

 [‹ WWII Propaganda - Rosie the Riveter Poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062733/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42117 "Go to previous forum topic") [Not quite Universe ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062733/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42128 "Go to next forum topic")
author: retoid

comments.content:
funeral home and cremation looks like Trajan stretched  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trajan/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080720062733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trajan/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trajan/")
Thank you bj, any idea on the script?

I am going to just trace it for the time being.

Thanks

Thanks. Sorry to ask for two ID’s in one thread. My bad.

I have gotten the info I need.

Thank you Font Guru’s
